title: Save the refugees
content:
Clear out the Goblin Camp

Kagha, the leader of the Druids decide to close the grove and expel all the Tiefling refugees. If you saved the Goblin Sazza at makeshift prison (Quest Save the Goblin Sazza). The priestess wants you to help her open the gate of Druid Grove and slaughter all the refugees. The Goblin camp lies to the northwest of Blighted Village.
